instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3437: What is 820-3437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No Video No Chime and has cpu vcore
threads.message: Hey guys working on this macbook air, and whats driving me crazy its doing the same exact shit a <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> will do and i have not even yet figured out what causes that shit. So i plug it in fans spins mouse lights up but has no chime or no video display i am going to check some rails and report back open for any ideas in the mean time i know there are sometimes it could be the bios but never one time that shit worked for me..

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No Video No Chime and has cpu vcore
threads.message: <CHIP>U1900</CHIP> to Y1905 traces. Was this liquid?

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No Video No Chime and has cpu vcore
threads.message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 27446"]<CHIP>U1900</CHIP> to Y1905 traces. Was this liquid?[/QUOTE]

No water damage traces look fine

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No Video No Chime and has cpu vcore
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No Video No Chime and has cpu vcore
threads.message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 27484"]Could be anything. History?[/QUOTE]

You were right on the spot Duke, again no bad traces but i said screw it i replaced the <CHIP>U1900</CHIP> clock chip and Y1905 got video and chime now mark as solved again !
